name: Card Master Memory Game
description:
Thousands of people from around the world take their memory sports seriously. Recalling a shuffled deck of 52 playing cards is a staple of many memory competitions. People stretch their memory prowess to the limit to recall an entire deck in mere minutes.

If you like exercises that flex your memory, Card Master is the game for you. Have fun and do something that will help exercise the old noggin!

Features:

-Card Master is now universal. Use it on your iPhone or iPad.

- Choose how many cards you want to memorize and recall. You don't need to start with 52 cards!

- Three speeds.

- Intuitive interface that allows you to recall cards quickly.

- Times your recall and tracks errors.

- Save your top 5 high scores!

Have a question? info@frontpocketmedia.com
